thread.title: "England are wearing a nice kit, shame it's Scotland's" - Twitter reacts to new BLUE shirt
thread.title_full: "England are wearing a nice kit, shame it's Scotland's" - Twitter reacts to new BLUE shirt

author: Mark Jones
title: "England are wearing a nice kit, shame it's Scotland's" - Twitter reacts to new BLUE shirt
text:
Och, it's not too bad laddie (Photo: Shaun Botterill) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
New kits are always exciting, aren't they? And new England kits are often the most exciting of the lot. 
At least they used to be when people still cared about international football. 
Anyway, enough with the negativity. This is Gareth Southgate's brave new England we're talking about now, and they've got a striking blue away kit in which to be brave in, which they wore for the first time in Wednesday's friendly with Germany . 
And if you ask us, it's actually quite nice, but the bods at Nike must have realised that bringing out a dark blue kit was going to raise some questions. Eric Dier does his thing in the new kit (Photo: Michael Regan - The FA) And Jamie Vardy tests out how stretchy the shorts are (Photo: Michael Regan - The FA) 
And there was a common theme running through plenty of the tweets about it. But while the Scotland shouts were everywhere, most people seemed to quite like the kit And some didn't Who'd be a kit designer, eh? poll loading Do you like the new England away kit? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
